link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Identity " Value of Capital ( Capital = Paid up Equity Capital + Compulsory convertible preference shares )" do not tally

Identity " Value of Free Reserves ( Free Reserves = Special Reserve (45 IC) + Debenture redemmption Reserve + Securities Premium Account + Capital Reserve + General reserve + Credit Balance in P & L + Capital Redemption Reserve + Preference Share Redemption Reserve )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Less ( Less = Accumulated Loss Balance + Deferred Revenue Expenditure + Book value of intangible assets )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Aggregate of Owned Funds ( = Capital + Free Reserve - Less )" do not tally

Identity " Value of 50% of the above ( = 50 percent of Unrealized appreciation in the book value of quoted investments as at the date of the last audited balance sheet as at the end of the financial year )" do not tally

Identity " Value of Adjusted Net Worth (ANW) ( = 50% of the above + Increase, if any, in the equity share capital since the date of the last audited balance sheet. - Amount of diminution in the aggregate book value of quoted investments - Reduction, if any, in the equity share capital since the date of the last audited balance sheet )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Leverage Ratio ( Leverage Ratio = Outside Liabilities / Adjusted Net Worth (ANW) )" do not tally
Identity " Value of TOTAL of Share Holding Pattern ( = Central Govt. + State Govt. + Banks, Fis, Insurance Cos. + FDIs + Mutual Funds + Corporates + Public + Indian Promoters + Others )" do not tally

Identity " Value of Sub-total of investment ( = Bonds of public sector banks - Amounts deducted in PART 1 + Bonds of public sector banks - Amounts not deducted in PART 1 + FDs/CDs/bonds of public financial institutions - Amounts deducted in PART 1 + FDs/CDs/bonds of public financial institutions - Amounts not deducted in PART 1 )" do not tally

Identity " Value of Sub-total of (d) Shares of all companies and debentures/ bonds/ commercial papers of companies and units of all mutual funds ( = Amounts deducted in PART 1 + Amounts not deducted in PART 1)" do not tally
Identity " Value of Sub-total of Stock on hire ( = Amounts deducted in PART 1 + Amounts not deducted in PART 1)" do not tally
Identity " Value of Sub-total of Inter-corporate loans/ deposits ( = Amounts deducted in PART 1 + Amounts not deducted in PART 1 )" do not tally

Identity " Value of Sub-total of loans and advances ( = Loans and advances fully secured against deposits held + Loans to staff + Other secured loans and advances considered good - Amounts deducted in PART 1 + Other secured loans and advances considered good - Amounts not deducted in PART 1)" do not tally

Identity " Value of Sub-total of Bills purchased/discounted ( = Bills purchased/discounted + Amounts deducted in PART 1 and + Bills purchased/discounted + Amounts not deducted in PART 1 )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Sub-total of Assets leased out ( =Assets leased out - (i) Amounts deducted in PART 1 and Assets leased out - (ii) Amounts not deducted in PART 1)" do not tally

Identity " Value of Total credit exposure ( = Sub-total of Stock on hire + Sub-total of Inter-corporate loans/ deposits + Sub-total of loans and advances + Sub-total of Bills purchased/discounted + Others + Sub-total of Assets leased out)" do not tally

Identity " Value of Total weighted assets ( = I. Cash + II. Bank balances including fixed deposits & certificates of deposits + III. The deposits/collateral kept with CCIL in connection with CBLO + (a) Approved securities as defined in Reserve Bank of India Act, 1934 + Sub-total of FDs/CDs/bonds of public financial institutions + Sub-total of Shares of all companies and debentures/ bonds/ commercial papers of companies and units of all mutual funds + Total credit exposure + (b) Premises + (c) Furniture & Fixtures + (a) Income-tax deducted at source (net of Provisions) + (b) Advance tax paid (net of Provision) + (c) Interest due on Government securities + (d) Others + (a) Fund-based claims on the Central Government + (b) Direct loan / credit / overdraft exposure and investment in State Government securities + (c) Central Government guaranteed claims + (d) State Government guaranteed claims, which have not remained in default / which are in default for a period not more than 90 days + (e) State Government guaranteed claims which have remained in default for a period of more than 90 days)" do not tally
Identity " Value of AdjustedValue-Cash ( = Book Value x Risk Weight for Cash )" do not tally

Identity " Value of Adjusted Value-Bank Balances Including Fixed Deposits And Certificates Of Deposits ( = Book Value x Risk Weight for Bank balances including fixed deposits & certificates of deposits )" do not tally

Identity " Value of Adjusted Value-The Deposits Or Collateral Kept With CCIL In Connection With CBLO ( = Adjusted Value -The Deposits Or Collateral Kept With CCIL In Connection With CBLO )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Adjusted Value-Investments ( = Book Value x Risk Weight for Investments )" do not tally
Identity " Value of AdjustedValue-CurrentAssets ( = Book Value x Risk Weight for Current Assets )" do not tally
Identity " Value of AdjustedValue-FixedAssetNetOfDepreciation ( = Book Value x Risk Weight for Fixed Asset (net of depreciation) )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Adjusted Value-Other Assets ( = Book Value x Risk Weight for Other Assets )" do not tally
Identity " Value of AdjustedValue-DomesticSovereign ( = Book Value x Risk Weight for Domestic sovereign )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Total of Current Assets ( = sum of values of current assets of all company )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Total of Other Assets ( = sum of values of other assets of all company)" do not tally
Identity " Value of Equivalent Value ( = Book Value X Conversion Factor)" do not tally
Identity " Value of Adjusted Value ( = Equivalent Value X Risk Weight)" do not tally

Identity " Value of Aggregate risk weighted assets ( = Adjusted value of funded risk assets i.e. on-balance sheet items (To tally with Part-2) + Adjusted value of non-funded and off-balance sheet items (To tally with Part-3) )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Ratio of Adjusted Net Worth (ANW) to its aggregate risk weighted assets ( = Adjusted Net Worth (ANW) / Aggregate risk weighted assets )" do not tally

Identity " Value of Total non-funded exposures ( = Financial & Other guarantees + Share/debenture underwriting obligations + Partly paid shares/debentures + Bills rediscounted + Lease contracts entered into but yet to be executed + Sale and repurchase agreement and asset sales with recourse, where the credit risk remains with the applicable NBFC. + Forward asset purchases, forward deposits and partly paid shares and securities, which represent commitments with certain draw down. + Lending of NBFC securities or posting of securities as collateral by the NBFC-IFC, including instances where these arise out of repo style transactions + Similar commitments that are unconditionally cancellable at any time by the NBFC-IFC without prior notice or that effectively provide for automatic cancellation due to deterioration in a borrower's credit worthiness + Unconditional take-out finance + Conditional take-out finance + Other commitments (e.g., formal standby facilities and credit lines) with an original maturity of up to one year + Other commitments (e.g., formal standby facilities and credit lines) with an original maturity of over one year + Commitment to provide liquidity facility for securitization of standard asset transactions + Second loss credit enhancement for securitization of standard asset transactions provided by third party + Interest Rate Contracts -Less than 1 year + Interest Rate Contracts -1 year < 5 years + Interest Rate Contracts - 5 years & above + Exchange Rate Contracts & Gold -Less than 1 year + Exchange Rate Contracts & Gold -1 year < 5 years + Exchange Rate Contracts & Gold - 5 years & above + Other contingent liabilities (To be specified in remarks column) )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Total of Outstanding Amount ( = Book value of bonds + debentures + outstanding loans and advances to + deposits with subsidiaries and companies in the same group )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Total of Outstanding Amount ( = Investments in shares of subsidiaries and companies in the same group and all non-banking financial companies )" do not tally

Identity " Value of Total of Outstanding Amount ( = Investments by way of shares, debentures, loans and advances, leasing, hire purchase finance, deposits etc. in other companies, firms and proprietary concerns where directors of the company hold substantial interest )" do not tally
Please enter valid PAN if applicable, otherwise enter NA.
